Giving three stars bc I’ve had a mixed experience with this company. I thought a black corset two years ago for Halloween and loved it, so this year I needed a red one for a Christmas bar crawl. I ordered both red options (bright and dark) very last minute just to have a choice in case I didn’t like the bright red, and I’m glad I did bc the bright red one came filthy. The dark red one was clearly new and clean, and it worked for me so I wore it. The bright red one was dirty, and looked like someone just took it off after use and sent it straight to me. Someone clearly used it for a costume (it had dark makeup/smudges) and then returned it, and then it was sent to me. So I have the black and dark red now. Great quality, I’m just disappointed that I was sent a dirty used one… (last pic was the dark red that worked great)

X-Small requires C-cups or larger. It does not cinch in waist or have good figure and is noticeably too large for the x-small person. 100 pounds and A-cup. There is no reason for an x-small to require c-cups or larger. This is poor manufacturing made with unrealistic proportions.

This corset isn’t the best, yet the price is okay. I’d say it doesn’t do much to enhance your body, but if it’s for a costume I would get it again. Definitely a one night thing. Not very comfortable either.

I will say that the item seems to be correct in its sizing, but not at all like the image photo. You can barely tell which is the top from the bottom as there is no distinctive bra like top to it like in the photo. It’s just one uniboob. The material that is used as its frame makes it exceptionally difficult to hook the clasps as it is too rigid and will not bend or yield to allow you to hook them either individually or all at once. It took me nearly a half hour just to get the clasps together because after I’d get about halfway through, the other end would pop out of the clasp and it was this continued back and forth. So you really need a second set of hands just to hold one end to make sure they don’t come undone while putting it on. The frame also doesn’t give enough to create that hourglass shape a corset is supposed to create, despite pulling and tightening the laces in the back of the corset. There’s barely any vertical support pieces to mimic herringbone corsets, but it is really just a cylindrical piece of plastic so there’s no possible way for it to create the hourglass shape. So it doesn’t really do anything or look anything like a real corset should. I wouldn’t buy it again..

评论概述: I had low expectations, but I was impressed!
评论详情: I bought this corset for a costume to wear over a shirt. Maybe I was so impressed because my expectations were low, but this is a really good corset! I purchased a fancy corset several years ago from a specialty shop that was at a VERY high price point, but I needed a different one with a sweetheart neckline, and I wasn’t willing to break the bank. This corset is honestly on par with the expensive one that I own. I bought a large because I wanted a cinch without it being too tight (my measurements are 35-30-36) and got the achieved result. If you want a really snatched waist, you could probably size down. The shiny pattern doesn’t cheapen the garment at all, which was what I was most afraid of. It’s a nice, sturdy corset for a low price.

评论概述: Super cute, great quality! Read this for best way to put it on
评论详情: I bought as a gift for a party and loved it so much I purchased on for myself. I am a G cup and this held me up wonderfully. Best way to put this on would be to wrap the corset around your body unclasped, lay down on your back, and hook the front clasps. Once as the clasps are hooked, stand up and grab the corset strings in the back to tighten. Will definitely buy more of these!
